channel.title: Dieing to a NPC and keeping items
channel.description:
Yea, so when I'm playing on my server, and I get killed by Bandos or anything else.. I keep all of my items for some reason.
When pking and someone dies, they lose there stuff fine, just have a problem with the NPC's.
If anyone has a code and show me where to look, I would appreciate it a lot!
Thanks, Aleksander.

item.title: Dieing to a NPC and keeping items
item.dc:creator: @Aleksander Aleksander
item.description:
@Aleksander wrote:

Good idea.

Read full topic
